dictionary.lore: Another sword made by the swordsmith Sorgel, who played an active part in the war against gods. The Holy Blade is said to have been crafted using the Sorgel's most refined techniques, therefore it was said to possess a power pure enough to vanquish evil. However, ironically many swordsmen fought over it due to its reputation, and in the end, Sorgel sealed the Holy Blade to prevent a war over it.
